languages.text: В пыли видны следы огромных ступней разной формы — одной человеческой, другой гротескно мутировавшей и когтистой.
There are large footprints in the dust, but the two feet are of different shapes — one human and the other clawed and horribly mutated.
languages.original_text: В пыли видны следы огромных ступней разной формы — одной человеческой, другой гротескно мутировавшей и когтистой.

traits.locale_text: There are large footprints in the dust, but the two feet are of different shapes — one human and the other clawed and horribly mutated.
There are large footprints in the dust, but the two feet are of different shapes — one human and the other clawed and horribly mutated.

There are large footprints in the dust, but the two feet are of different shapes — one human and the other clawed and horribly mutated.
There are large footprints in the dust, but the two feet are of different shapes — one human and the other clawed and horribly mutated.

languages.text: Vous décelez de grandes empreintes dans la poussière, mais les deux pieds sont de forme différente : l'un est humain, tandis que l'autre semble doté de griffes et déformé à l'extrême.
languages.original_text: There are large footprints in the dust, but the two feet are of different shapes — one human and the other clawed and horribly mutated.

traits.locale_text: Vous décelez de grandes empreintes dans la poussière, mais les deux pieds sont de forme différente : l'un est humain, tandis que l'autre semble doté de griffes et déformé à l'extrême.

languages.text: Hay pisadas grandes en el polvo, pero cada pie es de un tamaño: uno es humano y el otro presenta garras y una mutación terrible.
languages.original_text: There are large footprints in the dust, but the two feet are of different shapes — one human and the other clawed and horribly mutated.

traits.locale_text: Hay pisadas grandes en el polvo, pero cada pie es de un tamaño: uno es humano y el otro presenta garras y una mutación terrible.

languages.text: 尘土中印着硕大的脚印，但两只脚的形状不同。一只脚是人的脚印，而另一只脚带着利爪，而且发生了可怕的变异。
languages.original_text: There are large footprints in the dust, but the two feet are of different shapes — one human and the other clawed and horribly mutated.

traits.locale_text: 尘土中印着硕大的脚印，但两只脚的形状不同。一只脚是人的脚印，而另一只脚带着利爪，而且发生了可怕的变异。

languages.text: ホコリには大きな足跡が二つついているが、形が違う。一つは人間の足跡で、もう一つには獣の爪がついていて、変形している。
languages.original_text: There are large footprints in the dust, but the two feet are of different shapes — one human and the other clawed and horribly mutated.

traits.locale_text: ホコリには大きな足跡が二つついているが、形が違う。一つは人間の足跡で、もう一つには獣の爪がついていて、変形している。

languages.text: Im Staub sind große Fußabdrücke zu sehen, doch die zwei Füße haben unterschiedliche Formen. Einer ist menschlich, der andere mit Klauen besetzt und auf grauenhafte Weise mutiert.
languages.original_text: There are large footprints in the dust, but the two feet are of different shapes — one human and the other clawed and horribly mutated.

traits.locale_text: Im Staub sind große Fußabdrücke zu sehen, doch die zwei Füße haben unterschiedliche Formen. Einer ist menschlich, der andere mit Klauen besetzt und auf grauenhafte Weise mutiert.

languages.text: Tozun üstünde büyük ayak izleri var ancak iki çift ayak farklı. Biri insan, diğeri ise pençeli ve korkunç derecede mutasyon geçirmiş bir varlık.
languages.original_text: There are large footprints in the dust, but the two feet are of different shapes — one human and the other clawed and horribly mutated.
